name: AWESOME FLAPPY PONG 3D!!!
description:
YOU HAVE PLAYED FLAPPY BIRD!

YOU HAVE PLAYED PONG!

YOU HAVE PLAYED 3D GAMES!

NOW GET FLAPPY PONG 3D!

MAKE IT AWESOME TO AWESOME FLAPPY PONG 3D!!!

(Use w or space for player 1 and up arrow for player 2. R for resetting and ESC to exit the game.)

NOTE: As far as the 0h game jam is concerned, the version that has been submitted is the downloadable "AWESOME FLAPPY PONG 3D!!! (Windows 0h game jam)". All the other versions have been subject to a (though small) amount of polish.
